name: controller(_:didChange:at:for:newIndexPath:)
desc: Notifies the receiver that a fetched object has been changed due to an add, remove, move, or update.
declaration:
optional func controller(_ controller: NSFetchedResultsController<NSFetchRequestResult>, 
               didChange anObject: Any, 
                      at indexPath: IndexPath?, 
                     for type: NSFetchedResultsChangeType, 
            newIndexPath: IndexPath?)
